input: Batch request for bank card contracts of users with UUIDs 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef and 09876543-21ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts?$filter=CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements/PartyUUID eq '01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts?$filter=CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements/PartyUUID eq '09876543-21ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
